docs.snippet: American football is a violent game, but one that is beloved like no other. Would soccer be more popular in the United States if it were more rough-and-tumble? Purists say we are missing the point....
docs.lead_paragraph: American football is a violent game, but one that is beloved like no other. Would soccer be more popular in the United States if it were more rough-and-tumble? Purists say we are missing the point.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column questions whether soccer would be more popular in the United States if it were more violent; says people are drawn to big hits and midair collisions, like vicious hit on Brazil's Neymar by Colombia's Juan Camilo Zuniga at the World Cup, play that was reminiscent of scenes in the National Football League.

headline.main: After Theater in Brazil, Soccer’s Calloused Cousin Takes the Stage
headline.print_headline: After Theater in Brazil, Soccer’s Calloused Cousin Takes the Stage

docs.snippet: Football practices at which middle- and high-school students tackle each other will be restricted in California under a law signed on Monday by Democratic Governor Jerry Brown, the latest U.S. effort to minimize brain injuries from the popular spo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Football practices at which middle- and high-school students tackle each other will be restricted in California under a law signed on Monday by Democratic Governor Jerry Brown, the latest U.S. effort to minimize brain injuries from the popular sport.

docs.snippet: A judge likely will allow the attorney for former Minnesota Gophers quarterback Philip Nelson to have access to brain scans of the former football player Nelson is accused of assaulting, after the prosecutor and a lawyer for the victim indicated n...
docs.lead_paragraph: A judge likely will allow the attorney for former Minnesota Gophers quarterback Philip Nelson to have access to brain scans of the former football player Nelson is accused of assaulting, after the prosecutor and a lawyer for the victim indicated no opposition to the request Monday.
